pages.title: Weather Detector
pages.text: Citrine is very sensitive to the energies released during a storm.$(br2)If the weather detector is directly exposed to rain or a thunderstorm, it emits a redstone signal.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: Rain provides a signal with strength 8, thunderstorms of full 15.
黄水晶对风暴期间释放的能量非常敏感。$(br2)如果天气探测器直接暴露在雨或雷雨中，它会发出红石信号。
pages.title: 天气探测器

pages.text: 雨发出的信号强度为8，雷雨为15。
